ProjectTitle: Data-driven 3D Traction Force Microscopy to unravel microvascular disease mechanisms.
InitialFeedbackHistory:
24/05/2023
Data: please also list cells/materials/samples that you will use, these are physical data, do these need special management such as storage under specific conditions? Also note that, if you are using human cells including cell lines, that these are considered human bodily material for which registration with the UZL ethics committee is required, for more information and forms see: https://research.kuleuven.be/en/associatienet/ethics/guidance/humanmaterial
Documentation: You now describe publishing, archiving and data sharing, this question however asks about the documentation methods used during the research, the use on electronic lab notebooks and protocols for example.
label: good with suggestions
